Html:
Hi Guys,
i have a create software group "Net At Work". There exists 4 entries.
The dependences look like:
1) Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 x64 Redistributable - 10.0.40219
2) Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 x64 Redistributable - KB2565063 (Dependence: id 1)
3) Visual Studio 2010-Tools f√ºr Office-Laufzeit (Dependence: id 2)
4) Outlook Add-in 9.2.180.0 (32Bit) (Dependence id 3)

The programs 1-3 successfully installed. The last one is not found by the windows update on the client.

Environment Server:
  • Windows Server 2012R2
  • WSUS
  • Newest WPP Version
Environment Client:
  • Windows 7 Professional, SP1, 64Bit
  • Delete Windows Update Cache
  • In the correct wsus group
P.S. The rollout from the newst Adobe Flashplayer was no problem.
Delete all packages and deplay any one new. Now it works on all Clients.
